text: Doxospira is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae,. ==Species== Species within the genus Doxospira include: * Doxospira hertleini Shasky, 1971 ==References== * McLean, J.H. (1971) A revised classification of the family Turridae, with the proposal of new subfamilies, genera, and subgenera from the Eastern Pacific. The Veliger, 14, 114–130 ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Doxospira
